comments.comment:
M/S Sungandhika Fernando is a real Professional. What she talk about the present Judiciary System has to be really considered by the Ministry of Justice, President , Prime Minister , Cabinet & the Bar Association. Necessary action to be taken against people who has convicted injustice while serving as Officers involved in Courts,
Law should not differ depending on status of the people. Everyone should be treated alike. People go to courts to get a reasonable solution for their problems.It take years to get a decision or Judgment. Innocent people get punished due to in efficiency of Lawyers & cases are postponed as result of which innocent people get seriously harassed .
All genuine & honest Lawyers & citizens should support Sugandika to make required improvements in the system while minimizing the bad practices in the Industry. People believe that most of the  Lawyers ,once they die , they will be reborn as mosquito's & bugs who sucks blood of the Public.
Wish you all the courage &  Blessings of the Triple Gem to continue Maintaining the professional status of Lawyers & also the respect of courts.
All the best
comments.author: Yasantha Weerasooriya

comments.comment: Well done! We as a nation are with you! We are proud of you! I am willing to join you in your fight for justice for the future of Sri Lanka. It's the same with the Sri Lanka police too. Even when I go to a police station to get something done, the constables there harass me and use abusive words for no reason and when I complain about these things to the IGP Mr. Pujith Jayasundara, he ignores them and turns a blind eye to these atrocities. These things have to stop. Let's get together and fight this menace and make this country a better place for the future generations.
comments.author: Immanuel Jebamony

replies.replyComment: I am sorry to ruin your gender parade. As i really didn't want to mention the second word Postmodern feminism until you forced me to do so. I cannot write a book for you here. But i hate religious and gender bias.  We are living in a monolithic world where the evil agenda is always beneath the surface and the false theories like Capitalism, Socialism, Feminism, Human rights, Gay rights, Equality, Animal rights, Tri gender, Fair trade etc.....but we all know one thing for sure. "Those" who invented those mythologies are fully aware of them yet they did it purposely because they are too immoral. Secondly, they are masters in deception and skilled criminals own Nobel peace prices. Its "Kali yuga".  In this video, she speaks about politically backed corrupt legal system and how it ruins the lives of its people.  And there is absolutely no reason to pull the gender card and say "women's power", as we all know that both men, women children are victims of this system. Because we all know that where they claim to have equality, men flies to Russia and Thailand to seek a bride, and as usual, women are wondering where those good men are gone.

Mr.Bandara, I do not think you are aware of the terminology "modernism' . Here is a fragment of the definition modernism - " creation of traditional forms of art, architecture, literature, social organization, activities of daily life, and even the sciences post World War 1" . When I implied about women's power it had nothing to do with modernism, It had to do with human rights or should I say equality? . Just like you I fully support the betterment of our country so I guess there is nothing wrong with women empowerment as well.If we want a better nation everyone should be treated equally regardless of their gender.
Oh please dont bring your post modernism here. Keep it for yourself. She is our patriot who speaks for the betterment of this nation.

Dear Sugandika
Your speech is very touching. It is very sad to see SL justice system. Also you mention about MP‚Äôs and Minister‚Äôs perks, no other countries have such benefits e.g. (UK they us e their own transport and other facilities). We have  to fight against these type of crimes. Educate whole society. I am very proud person like you
 Best of luck
Metha

comments.comment: Ettatama adambari..sinha deneuwa oba gana..kata eti putai..ruwa eti..duwai..e arut dekama obata galapenewa  etamat mana vin..heta marunat mokada asadaranayata aukuttiyata satahan wadila...me rate dusittayo..nitiya rakina ..ewagema maha balawattu.desa palwo...anka ekata enna mewani desa paluwange mara balaya kawadat uodawanawa  unge wasiyata .ungema yahapata.mewani kantawan 100 hitiyot  me asadaranayata aukttiyata sataha karala jaya ganna bari kamak naha..et nitiya rakinnan nitiya tamanata one one vidiyata pavichchi..karanne..mudal kada kamata ho natinam desa palana mara yangen biyata..lajjai kiyanna..ada samajaye ugat minisundda me..maha lokuwata kot kalisam eda gattu maht horu...ege le kupita wenawa...mewa esena kota....amuda gasan kuburu kotana govi mahat waru..ape uttmacaharaya govi mahatune....ukttiya sadaranaya eda nodena.vinayak nati...sattu wage hasirena me wani niti rakinnangen eti.palaya kumadda? ai rate nayakayo..me gana pulul vimarsana karala..me kalakanin...visi kara nodamanne....mewage tawa kopmana dewal sagavila edda.....me sinha denuwa wage...ape rate nayakayot..konda kelin tabagena edriyediwat wada kata utu..kalot hoda neda...pirimi 1000 .k paradai..me sinha denuwata...asadaranaya aukttiya raja karanne boho keti kalayak..tawakalika suwaya pamanai.....koi tara tirame  kenek uwada wardak kalanam..nitiyen daduwam nati unat....sabaha dahama aniwaryen daduwam denewamai....atmayak atmayak gane taman karpu paw haba enewa....wardi karana aya bohomai ada samajaye..et awasanaye labena parati palaya bohomabayankarai...visesayen..dusita desa paluwan ..nitiya avinitaya lesa rakinnan..satara apayata watenawamai...ewa gana nodanai...metaram pahat  boru wancha kriyawal wala yedenne.....monawa karannda....yama rajutat ...wada awssai.enis polime ape rate dusita  desa palakayan ..nitiya avinitiya lesa rakinnan ohun enakam..maga balana enne....oba sinha denuwata rate janatawage uttama charaya....mjayama wewa..yana yana tana mal waseewa.obage jeevitaya gana oba arkssa viya utui...ape rate sattu gana oba nodannawa noweineda...harima satutak danenee sitata..mewani katawan pilibadawa......stuti.budusaranai..
